text: (napiye! Iprahimutaiya) nerana markkattai nokki nir umatu mukattai urutiyana ormaippattutan tiruppuviraka. (Atuve) manitarkalukkaka allah erpatuttiya iyarkai markkamakum. Avan pataitta (markkat)tai (evaralum) marrivita mutiyatu. Itutan nilaiyana (nermaiyana) markkam. Eninum, manitaril perumpalanavarkal (itai) arintukollave mattarkal
